survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with AI-Powered Grocery Delivery Chatbots Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and user experience with AI-powered chatbots in grocery delivery services, focusing on ease of use, accuracy, and overall service quality.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered chatbots for grocery delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to ensure clarity. Consider adding a 'Not Applicable' option if needed.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered chatbots for grocery delivery services?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you value most in an AI-powered grocery delivery chatbot? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you value most in an AI-powered grocery delivery chatbot? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the accuracy of product recommendations provided by the chatbot? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'This is my first time'.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the accuracy of product recommendations provided by the chatbot? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'This is my first time'.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for AI-powered grocery delivery chatbots?
